cmput301w18t22.com.tenner.classes

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • cmput301w18t22.com.tenner.classes.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    The User class represents a Tenner user, who could be either a requester, or provider, or both. It contains their first and last name, contact info (phone and email), and keeps track of the user's requested tasks, provided tasks, and bids.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Team 22
